text: "The question was about something bigger than how this day was.
I was trying to get at two things that had been on my mind since the election.
Basically I was asking him 'how fucked are we?'
Obama knew what I was asking and he sighed and shook his head and said, 'look, this isn't an ideal situation, to say the least.'
Understatement for the purposes of gallows humor is a tried and true Obamaism.
Then he said, 'maybe I am just looking for a silver lining, but I am hopeful that this will be the clarifying event, that will show the public the two different visions for the country.'
And there it was, the eternal optimism and unending faith in the American people.
I am going to miss him.
We are going to miss him."
